00016     struct NotYetImplementedException {

00018             std::cerr << what << ": Not yet implemented!" << std::endl;

00120             template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00121                 struct ConstructLoop {
00122                     static void row_loop (N a[D][D]);
00123                     static void col_loop (N a[D][D]);

00129                 struct ConstructLoop<D_, 0, j> {

00136             template <unsigned D_, unsigned i>
00137                 struct ConstructLoop<D_, i, 0> {
00138                     static void row_loop (N a[D][D]);
00139                     static void col_loop (N a[D][D]);

00144             template <unsigned D_>
00145                 struct ConstructLoop<D_, 0, 0> {
00147 
00149                     static void row_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00150                         a[0][0] = (N)1;
00151                     }
00153 
00155                     static void col_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00156                         a[0][0] = (N)1;
00157                     }
00158             };

00318 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00319     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix() {
00320         ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00321     }
00322 
00324 
00333 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00334     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix(unsigned axis1, unsigned axis2, N alpha) {
00335         // costruct a unity matrix first
00336         ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00337         // then replace the appropriate elements by sin/cos of the rotation angle
00338         N s = sin (alpha), c = cos (alpha);
00339         data_[axis1][axis1] =  data_[axis2][axis2] = c;
00340         data_[axis1][axis2] = -s;
00341         data_[axis2][axis1] = s;
00342 
00343       }
00344 
00346 
00351 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00352     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix(bool random) {
00353         if (random) {
00354             for(unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00355                 for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00356                     data_[i][j] = random? N (rand ())/RAND_MAX: 0;
00357                 if (!random) data_[i][i] = 1;
00358             }
00359         }
00360         else {
00361             ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00362         }
00363     }
00364 
00366 
00369 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00370     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (const N a[D][D]) {
00371         CopyLoop<D-1, D-1, D>::copy_row (a, data_);
00372     }
00373 
00374 
00376 
00381 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00382     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (const N *a) {
00383         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00384             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00385                 data_[i][j] = a[i*D+j];
00386     }
00387

00391 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00392     inline N
00393         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::operator() (unsigned i, unsigned j) const {
00394             assert (i < D);
00395             assert (j < D);
00396             return data_[i][j];
00397         }

00404         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::operator() (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00405             assert (i < D);
00406             assert (j < D);
00407             return data_[i][j];
00408         }

00416 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00417     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>
00418         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::operator* (const Matrix<D, N>& other) {
00419             Matrix<D, N> tmp;
00420             Multiply<D>::multiply (data_, other.data_, tmp.data_);
00421             return tmp;
00422         }

00425 
00429 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00430     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>
00431         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::operator*= (const Matrix<D, N>& other) {
00432             Matrix<D, N> tmp (*this);
00433             Multiply<D>::multiply (tmp.data_, other.data_, data_);
00434             return *this;
00435         }

00440 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00441     void
00442         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::print () {
00443             std::cout << D << "x" << D << ":";
00444             for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00445                 std::cout << (i > 0? " |": "") << std::endl << "|";
00446                 for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00447                     std::cout << std::setw (6) << std::setprecision (3)
00448                               << operator ()(i, j);
00449             }
00450             std::cout << " |" << std::endl;
00451         }

00470 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00471     template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00472         inline void
00473         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, i, j>::row_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00474             ConstructLoop<D, i, j>::col_loop(a);
00475             ConstructLoop<D, i-1, j>::row_loop(a);
00476         }

00487 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00488     template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00489         inline void
00490         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, i, j>::col_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00491             ConstructLoop<D, i, j-1>::col_loop(a);
00492             a[i][j] = (i == j? (N)1: (N)0);
00493         }

00507         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, 0, j>::row_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00508             ConstructLoop<D, 0, j>::col_loop(a);

00523             ConstructLoop<D, 0, j-1>::col_loop(a);

00554         inline void
00555         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, i, 0>::col_loop (N a[D][D]) {

00577 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00578     template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned k, unsigned D_>
00579     inline void
00580     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, k, D_>::loop (
00581             const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00582         c[i][j] += a[i][k]*b[k][j];
00583         MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, k-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00584       }

00596 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00597     template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
00598         inline void
00599         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, 0, D_>::loop (
00600                 const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00601         c[i][j] += a[i][0]*b[0][j];
00602       }

00621 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00622     template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
00623         inline void
00624         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyColLoop<i, j, D_>::loop (
00625                 const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00626             c[i][j] = 0;
00627             MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00628             MultiplyColLoop<i, j-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00629         }

00639 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00640   template <unsigned i, unsigned D_>
00641     inline void
00642       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyColLoop<i, 0, D_>::loop (const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00643         c[i][0] = 0;
00644         MultiplyInnerLoop<i, 0, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00645       }

00663 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00664   template <unsigned i, unsigned D_>
00665     inline void
00666         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyRowLoop<i, D_>::loop (const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00667           MultiplyColLoop<i, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00668           MultiplyRowLoop<i-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00669         }

00685                                                           const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00686         MultiplyColLoop<0, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);

00714 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00715   Matrix<D-1, N>
00716     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::matrix_minor (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00717       throw new NotYetImplementedException ();
00718       Matrix<D-1, N> tmp;
00719       for (unsigned I = 0, II = 0; I < D; I++)
00720         if (I != i) {
00721         for (unsigned J = 0, JJ = 0; J < D; J++)
00722           if (J != j) {
00723           tmp (II, JJ) = *this (I, J);
00724           JJ++;
00725           }
00726           II++;
00727         }
00728         return tmp;
00729   }
00730 
00731 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00732   template<unsigned D_>
00733     inline N
00734       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Det<D_>::det (/*const*/ N a[D][D]) {
00735         return SumLoop<D, D-1>::sumloop (a);
00736       }
00737 /*
00738 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00739   template<typename N_>
00740     inline N_
00741       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Det<1, N_>::det (/*const// N_ a[1][1]) {
00742         return a[0][0];
00743       }
00744 */
00745 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00746   template<unsigned D_, int i>
00747     inline N
00748       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop<D_, i>::sumloop (/*const*/ N a[D][D])  {
00749         N **tmp1 = Minor<i, 0, D>::minor(a);
00750         N tmp2 = a[i][0]
00751                   * Det<D-1>::det(tmp1)
00752                   * ( (i&1)? -1: 1 )
00753                   + SumLoop<D, i-1>::sumloop (a);
00754         delete[] tmp1;
00755         return tmp2;
00756       }
00757 
00758 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00759   template<unsigned D_>
00760     inline N
00761       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop<D_, 0>::sumloop (/*const*/ N a[D][D]) {
00762         N **tmp1 = Minor<0, 0, D_>::minor (a);
00763         N tmp2 = a[0][0] * Det<D-1>::det (tmp1);
00764         delete [] tmp1;
00765         return tmp2;
00766       }
00767 /*
00768 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00769   template<typename N_>
00770     inline N_
00771       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop <0, 0, N_>::sumloop (const N_ a[1][1]) {
00772         return a[0][0];
00773       }
00774 */
00775 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00776     template<unsigned k, unsigned D_>
00777         inline void
00778             VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MinorLoop<k, D_>::minorloop (N ** a, N **tmp) {
00779               tmp[k-1] = a[k]+1;
00780               MinorLoop<k-1, D>::minorloop (a, tmp);
00781           }
00782 
00783 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00784     template<unsigned D_>
00785         inline void
00786             VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MinorLoop<1, D_>::minorloop (N ** a, N **tmp) {
00787               tmp[0] = a[1]+1;
00788             }
00789 
00790 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00791     template<unsigned i, unsigned D_>
00792         inline /*const*/ N **
00793             VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Minor<i, 0, D_>::minor (/*const*/ N **a) {
00794               /*const*/ N **tmp = new /*const*/ N* [D-1];  //  watch out for memory leaks here!
00795                                                         //  the caller must free this memory!
00796               for (unsigned k = 1; k < D; k++)
00797                 tmp[k-1] = a[k]+1;
00798               //    MinorLoop<D-1, D>::minorloop (a, tmp);
00799               return tmp;
00800             }

00807               CopyLoop<i-1, j, D>::copy_row (from, to);
00808               CopyLoop<i, j, D>::copy_col (from, to);
